goals.active: Report to Tribune Desertgrave at the Black Citadel.
goals.complete: Flame Legion assassins attacked Tribune Desertgrave within the Black Citadel itself! After we terminated them, she sent me to contact her agent, Sicaea the Shrouded, at the Serrated Blade Tavern. Time to initiate counterespionage.

goals.active: Meet Tribune Desertgrave's agent at the Serrated Blade.
goals.complete: Sicaea the Shrouded and I secured the password to the Flame Legion camp.

goals.active: Report to Tribune Desertgrave at her office.
goals.complete: I reported back to Torga Desertgrave. Rytlock Brimstone wanted in, but Desertgrave would not let him or the Blood Legion contribute any more to the operation. She's determined to make it exclusively Ash Legion infiltrating the enemy.
